name: DomainValidator_isValidLocalTldTest
description: Unit tests for the isValidLocalTld method of DomainValidator.

test_cases.name: testIsValidLocalTld_ValidLocalTld
test_cases.description: Tests the isValidLocalTld method with a valid local TLD.

test_cases.name: testIsValidLocalTld_InvalidLocalTld
test_cases.description: Tests the isValidLocalTld method with an invalid local TLD.

test_cases.name: testIsValidLocalTld_ValidLocalTldWithPlus
test_cases.description: Tests the isValidLocalTld method with a valid local TLD containing '+'.

test_cases.name: testIsValidLocalTld_InvalidLocalTldWithMinus
test_cases.description: Tests the isValidLocalTld method with an invalid local TLD containing '-'.
